channel.title: Blogs on Rumor Theory
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Rumor Theory

item.title: Age of First death from coronavirus in the United States? 50
item.description: A patient infected with the novel coronavirus in Washington state has died, a state health official said Saturday, marking the first death due to the virus in the United States.

item.title: 《電流大戰》告訴我們那些課本沒教的事！「發明大王」愛迪生原來這麼黑暗...5大亮點搶先看
item.description: 其實這些「偉人」都曾有一段黑暗不堪的過往啊… 《

item.title: Pope Francis, got coronavirus ?
item.description: Pope Francis appeared at his study window on this cold and windy Sunday, March 1, to greet and pray with pilgrims in St. Peter’s Square, but at the end of the audience he announced that “sadly” he will not join senior Roman Curia officials at the weeklong spiritual exercises at a retreat house in Arricia, outside Rome, because of his “cold.
